text: Miguel Giubergia (17 April 1953 â€“ 8 October 2020) was a Argentine politician. He was a Deputy from 1999 to 2011. Giubergia was a member of the Radical Civic Union. He was born in Jujuy Province, Argentina. Giubergia died on 8 October 2020 from COVID-19 in Jujuy Province at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Argentina Category:Argentine politicians Category:Jujuy Province
title: Miguel Giubergia
